subject: RE: [PMX:#] RE: [junit] Setting up JUnit on Mac OS X Panther
msgSnippet: ... Simon, I ve never had trouble running JUnit tests via Ant on Windows.  Is the classloader problem that you mention specific to Mac OS X?  I haven t tried
messageBody:
> Yes. This is true. The reason is to do with classloaders.
> Both Ant and JUnit employ their own custom classloaders and
> they don't play well together! (There is a long technical
> reason, but it's Monday morning, so "don't play well
> together" will have to do for now. ;-)

Simon,

I've never had trouble running JUnit tests via Ant on Windows. Is the
classloader problem that you mention specific to Mac OS X? I haven't tried
much development work on my Mac at home, but I've been planning to do more.
I would like to know a bit more about this potential hurdle; can you muster
it? ;-)

Thanks,
Craig

<<<<<<<<<<<<< >>>>>>>>>>>>>
